definitions.definition: One who or that which transmits something (in all senses).

An electronic device that generates and amplifies a carrier wave , modulates it with a meaningful signal derived from speech , music , TV or other sources , and broadcasts the resulting signal from an antenna .

main_definition: One who or that which transmits something (in all senses).
secondary_definitions: An electronic device that generates and amplifies a carrier wave , modulates it with a meaningful signal derived from speech , music , TV or other sources , and broadcasts the resulting signal from an antenna .
